title: Movie Trivia Night Reminder
body:
Registration for Movie Trivia Night, which will be held one week from tonight in the banquet room at Patton Alley Pub, starts today. Hmmm, that sentence is confusing. Registration starts today and will run up until the event. There seems to be a rumor spreading that the trivia is all Moxie-related, or all about movies that were played at The Moxie. This, my friends, is not true. Yes, there will be some Moxie-related questions, but the vast majority are general movie themed. I just wanted to clear that up.

ALSO: there seems to be some confusion about how the trivia will be answered. Let me clear that up as well.

  1. There are three sections of trivia

  2. Each team is given an answer sheet at the beginning of each section

  3. I will announce a trivia question

  4. Your team will write down the answer

  5. At the end of the section, teams will turn in their sheets to be scored

  6. Before the next section begins, the scores and answers from the last section will be announced

  7. Rinse and repeat

If you're still confused, just watch season one / episode three of the British version of The Office. That's how we're going to do it... only we won't be throwing someone's shoes over the pub at the end of the night.

And now I'm off to go buy some lemon-scented soap!
author: Dan
